Sid.description: The SID of the WebChannel resource to update.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the WebChannel resource and owns this Workflow.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**flex_flow_sid**: The SID of the Flex Flow.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the WebChannel resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the WebChannel resource.
